question: Who among the following queens of the Kakatiya dynasty ruled over Warangal, part of modern Andhra Pradesh?
explanation: Rani Rudrama Devi or Rudradeva Maharaja was a monarch of the Kakatiya dynasty in the Deccan Plateau with capital at Warangal of present. The Kakatiya dynasty was a South Indian dynasty whose capital was Orugallu, now known as Warangal.
